idea-plugin.name: Java Code Helper
idea-plugin.description:
For learning plug-in development。Exchange ideas 、 Feed back BUG：gitee

  • Automatic completionContributor
    1.In the construction method, complete the field assignment
    2.In the non construction method, complete the code according to the characters entered
  • Fast Jump
    1.Support fast jump between feign and controller. Click the jump icon to jump
    2.Support quick jump of sql and java
  • One click translation
    At present, only Baidu Translation is supported. You need to apply for Baidu Translation Platform account and translate 1 million characters for free every month
    After configuring the account in the idea, select the text to be translated, right-click and select Translate
  • Code suggestions
    Perfecting...
  • Generate code according to the table creating SQL
    It is mainly used for learning plug-in development. Its functions are relatively simple. It is recommended to use other more perfect plug-ins to generate code
    It is recommended to use a custom template. The generated code is more consistent with your project. Template Rules：gitee

很蛋疼，官方要求必须英文开始

用于学习插件开发。交流想法、反馈BUG ：gitee

  • 自动补全
    1.构造方法内，补全字段赋值
    2.非构造方法内，根据输入的字符，补全代码
  • 快捷跳转
    1.支持feign与controller的快捷跳转，点击图标跳转
    2.支持sql与java的快捷跳转
  • 一键翻译
    目前仅支持百度翻译，需申请百度翻译平台账号，每月免费翻译100万字符
    在idea中配置账号后，选中待翻译文本，右击选择Translate即可
  • 代码建议
    完善中...
  • 根据建表SQL生成代码
    主要用于学习插件开发，功能比较单一，建议使用其他更完善的插件去生成代码
    建议使用自定义模板，生成的代码更符合自己的项目，模板规则：gitee
